ygData.subject: Convoy
ygData.msgSnippet: Sighes Thank you for the help, but I assure you my friend... He fired one of the cannons point blank at the second pred. I can handle these two myself. he

"Sighes" Thank you for the help, but I assure you my friend..." He 
fired one of the cannons point blank at the second pred. "I can 
handle these two myself. he reached down and ran his hand over his 
maximal symbol and it became a red cross... "If you would be my 
cover, I will attend to the wounded thus far."
